thread.title: Donald Trump: U.S. Weighing Singapore, Korean ‘DMZ’ for Kim Summit

author: Michael C. Bender
title: Donald Trump: U.S. Weighing Singapore, Korean ‘DMZ’ for Kim Summit
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump said Monday he was considering Singapore and the demilitarized zone on the Korean Peninsula as the site for his summit with Kim Jong Un, signaling a debate inside the White House over whether to hold the high-profile meeting in a neutral location or on the doorstep of the North Korean leader.
Mr. Trump also raised expectations for the summit by saying he would define success only as convincing North Korea to abandon its nuclear-weapons program.
... RELATED VIDEO A meeting between President Donald Trump and North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un could be a diplomatic breakthrough, but both men are nothing if not unpredictable.
